summary: Michael Mateta is a Digital Solutions Architect with Microsoft Certifications in Data Engineering and Power BI Analysis. A strategist, who understands business needs and delivers `full-cycle' projects. Thrives at the interface between the business and technical world.
work_experience:
I have worked as
a Senior SQL BI Developer for 10 years then became a Data Engineer in Azure Cloud solutions before now being a
Solutions Architect.

Technically experienced in current and
emerging technologies and focussed on today`s and tomorrow`s technical priorities, including in Cloud Architecture,
Database Development, Data Modelling Design, Test Driven Development and Analysis, Azure Databricks, Data
Factory, DevOps and SQL Server.

Relationship Management • Training / Mentoring / Coaching
